item.title: 俄罗斯铝业公司担心新的俄罗斯金属制裁措施会危及 36% 的销售额
item.description: 据一位接近俄罗斯铝业巨头俄铝国际联合股份公司（United Co Rusal International PJSC）的人士透露，该公司担心多达 36% 的销售额可能会因英国和美国实施的制裁而面临风险。【原文：Russian aluminum giant United Co Rusal International PJSC fears that as much as 36% of its sales may be at risk as a result of sanctions imposed by the UK and US, according to a person close to the company.】

item.title: 美联储加息至 6.5% 是瑞银策略师面临的 "真正风险
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的策略师表示，美国经济增长强劲，通胀持续高企，这使得美联储加息而非降息的可能性上升，从而使明年的借贷成本高达 6.5%。【原文：The combination of strong US growth and sticky inflation is raising the odds the Federal Reserve hikes rather than cuts interest rates, bringing borrowing costs to as high as 6.5% next year, according to UBS Group AG strategists.】

item.title: 资本集团时隔两年重返德意志银行投资者行列
item.description: 资本集团在出售德意志银行股份公司两年后，再次成为该银行的主要股东。【原文：Capital Group is once again a major shareholder in Deutsche Bank AG, two years after selling out of the lender.】

item.title: 英国开始为最强大的模型起草人工智能法规
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，英国正开始起草人工智能管理条例，重点是支持 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 的最强大的语言模型。【原文：The UK is starting to draft regulations to govern artificial intelligence, focusing on the most powerful language models which underpin OpenAI’s ChatGPT, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Marex 集团和股东在美国首次公开募股中寻求高达 3.23 亿美元的投资
item.description: Marex Group Plc 和这家总部位于伦敦的公司的一些股东正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集高达 3.23 亿美元的资金。【原文：Marex Group Plc and a group of the London-based firm’s shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $323 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 分析师争论估值和增长前景，Reddit 股价下滑
item.description: Reddit 公司股价周一最多下跌 5.1%，创下 3 月份上市以来的最低水平，此前华尔街众多分析师启动了对这家社交媒体公司的研究。【原文：Reddit Inc. shares fell as much as 5.1% Monday to hit the lowest level since its March trading debut after a slew of Wall Street analysts initiated coverage of the social-media company.】

item.title: 人工智能需求激增对电力市场的影响
item.description:
微软招聘的首位能源专家谈人工智能热潮。【原文：

Microsoft’s first energy hire talks the AI boom.

】

item.title: 杰夫-塔尔平斯的对冲基金 Element 将向客户返还 40 亿美元
item.description: 杰夫-塔尔平斯（Jeff Talpins）经营的对冲基金 Element Capital Management 将向外部客户返还约 40 亿美元，公司将缩减规模以提高回报率，并转向主要管理自有资本。【原文：Element Capital Management, the hedge fund run by Jeff Talpins, will hand back about $4 billion to external clients as the firm downsizes to improve returns and moves toward managing mostly its own capital.】

item.title: M&T银行发布更高的业绩指引，创两年来最大涨幅
item.description: M&T Bank Corp. 在上调了其 2024 年净利息收入这一主要收入来源的预期后，股价创下两年来最大涨幅。【原文：M&T Bank Corp. shares jumped the most in two years after boosting its 2024 outlook for net interest income, a key source of revenue.】

item.title: 洛克希德 F-35 喷气式战斗机的维护成本预计将超过 1.5 万亿美元
item.description: 据一家政府监督机构称，世界上最昂贵的武器项目--洛克希德-马丁公司的 F-35 战斗机--正变得更加昂贵。【原文：The world’s costliest weapons program, Lockheed Martin Corp.’s F-35 fighter jet, is getting even more expensive, according to a government watchdog.】

item.title: EIU 报告称中国工业产能过剩已达顶峰
item.description: 经济学人》智库称，随着全球消费领域需求的回升，中国制造业的整体产能过剩已达到顶峰，并预测由于中国企业竞争力的提升，贸易紧张局势将持续下去。【原文：China’s overall manufacturing overcapacity has peaked as global demand picks up in consumer sectors, the Economist Intelligence Unit said, predicting trade tensions will persist due to Chinese companies’ rising competitiveness.】

item.title: 大跌之后，"准备买入 "国债的理由浮出水面
item.description:
卡梅伦-道森（Cameron Dawson）说，随着收益率接近5%，收入看起来太诱人了，我们不能错过

。【原文：

As yields approach 5%, income looks too tempting to pass up, Cameron Dawson says

】

item.title: 财政部长称加纳重组受阻只是小插曲
item.description: 加纳财政部长穆罕默德-阿明-亚当（Mohammed Amin Adam）表示，加纳在债务重组谈判中取得了 "重大进展"，周一导致其欧元债券暴跌的最新障碍将在与债券持有人的进一步谈判中得到解决。【原文：Ghana has made “significant progress” in debt-restructuring negotiations and the latest snag that sent its eurobonds tumbling on Monday will be ironed out in further talks with bondholders, Finance Minister Mohammed Amin Adam said.】

item.title: 油气井附近燃烧的 "僵尸大火 "威胁加拿大钻井商
item.description:
数十处去年的大火仍在积雪中燃烧

。【原文：

Dozens of last year’s blazes are still burning under snow

】

item.title: BDT、瑞信校友的 Citation Capital 寻求 8.5 亿美元投资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Citation Capital 正为其首支基金寻求筹集约 8.5 亿美元。【原文：Private equity firm Citation Capital is seeking to raise about $850 million for its debut fund, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大跨山项目给欧佩克成员国伊拉克带来麻烦
item.description: 加拿大最新的石油管道可能会给近 7000 英里外的一个中东国家带来麻烦：伊拉克。【原文：Canada’s newest oil pipeline may spell trouble for a Middle Eastern country almost 7,000 miles away: Iraq.】

item.title: 欧盟将考虑设立新的国家援助基金以促进整个集团的投资
item.description: 欧盟领导人将于本周讨论修改其严格的国家补助规则的方案，即建立一个新的机制，为跨成员国的项目提供资金。【原文：European Union leaders will discuss this week an option to amend its strict state-aid rules by creating a new mechanism to fund projects that span across member states.】

item.title: 尼日利亚巨型新炼油厂发布燃料装载视频
item.description: 尼日利亚庞大的丹格特炼油厂在社交媒体平台 X 上发布了一段视频，内容是该厂正在为一艘船和一辆卡车装载燃料。【原文：Nigeria’s enormous Dangote refinery posted videos on social media platform X of it loading a ship and trucks with fuel.】

item.title: 对冲基金涌入墨西哥比索，推动全球最佳涨势
item.description: 对冲基金继续加大对墨西哥比索的看涨押注，巩固了墨西哥比索作为全球最佳主要货币的地位，并使其有望创下新高。【原文：Hedge funds continue to boost bullish bets on the Mexican peso, strengthening its position as the best major currency in the world and keeping it on track to reach fresh highs.】

item.title: 解密石油对伊朗袭击以色列的令人费解的反应
item.description: 伊朗史无前例地向以色列发射导弹和无人机，石油市场却丝毫不受影响，布伦特原油甚至回落到每桶 90 美元以下。【原文：Iran’s unprecedented missile and drone barrage into Israel has left the oil market unperturbed, even sending Brent crude back below $90 a barrel.】

item.title: 摩根大通财报后开启银行债券销售大幕
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Wells Fargo & Co. are tapping the US high-grade bond market, the first in a likely parade of bond sales from Wall Street’s six biggest banks following their release of first-quarter results.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒在登记出售股票和认股权证后暴跌
item.description: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体初创公司在登记其股票可能被转售后，股价下挫高达 20%。【原文：Former president Donald Trump’s social media startup sank as much as 20% after the company registered its shares for potential resale.】

item.title: 派拉蒙公司的高等级债券持有人面临垃圾级的处境
item.description: 就在几个月前，派拉蒙全球公司债券持有人的生活还算不错。【原文：Just a few months ago, life as a Paramount Global bondholder was pretty good.】

item.title: 酒店投资商 Trinity 向合作伙伴集团出售少数股权
item.description: 酒店公司 Trinity Investments 将向瑞士私募股权公司 Partners Group Holding AG 出售少数股权，以促进其全球发展。【原文：Hotel company Trinity Investments is selling a minority stake in itself to Swiss private equity firm Partners Group Holding AG to help fuel its global growth.】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯仍预计今年开始降息
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，如果通胀率继续逐步下降，央行将可能在今年开始降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said the central bank will likely start lowering interest rates this year if inflation continues to gradually come down.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州高铁公司启动 12 亿美元垃圾债务出售计划
item.description: 佛罗里达州的高速铁路系统 Brightline 周一发行了 12.5 亿美元的债券，以开拓美国的高收益市场。【原文：Florida’s high-speed rail system, Brightline, is tapping the US high-yield market with a $1.25 billion offering on Monday.】

item.title: 地缘政治加剧美元押注，货币波动卷土重来
item.description: 由于交易商押注对中东地缘政治紧张局势和美国通胀快于预期的担忧将推动美元走高，货币市场的波动性正在激增。【原文：Volatility in the currency market is surging as traders bet renewed concerns over geopolitical tensions in the Middle East and faster-than-expected inflation in the US will propel the dollar higher.】

item.title: 3 月零售销售后国债收益率创 2024 年新高
item.description: 大多数美国国债收益率攀升至今年迄今的新高；2 年期国债收益率接近 5%；此前，零售销售数据强于预期，进一步削弱了投资者对美联储今年开始降息的信心。【原文：Most US Treasury yields climbed to new year-to-date highs — and the 2-year note’s approached 5% — after stronger-than-estimated retail sales data further eroded investor confidence in Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts beginning this year.】

item.title: 降息在即，加拿大房地产市场乐观情绪高涨
item.description: 加拿大人又开始看好住房了。【原文：Canadians are growing bullish on housing again.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩称当前的通货紧缩 "必然坎坷
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，消费价格增长的回落不可能一帆风顺。【原文：European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane said the retreat in consumer-price growth is unlikely to be smooth.】
